mapper.insert: INSERT INTO actor(actorno, actornameen, actornamekr, birth, nation, actorpic, actorthumb, actorpicsize) VALUES (actor_seq.nextval, #{actornameen}, #{actornamekr}, #{birth}, #{nation}, #{actorpic}, #{actorthumb}, #{actorpicsize})
mapper.select: SELECT actorno, actornameen, actornamekr, birth, nation, actorpic, actorthumb, actorpicsize FROM actor ORDER BY actorno
